duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide medical-surgical and telemetry nursing care and monitoring for patients with cardiovascular, respiratory, diabetic, and infectious conditions.
Participate in critical thinking and patient care management for medical and surgical patients.
Utilize cardiovascular monitoring and respiratory care techniques for patient assessment and intervention.
Manage and administer diabetes care and medication as per patient needs.
Coordinate and assist in surgical patient care and post-operative management.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an accredited school of Nursing
